thrust::device_allocator< void >::rebind< U > Struct Template Reference

#include <device_allocator.h>

List of all members.

Public Types

typedef device_allocator< U > other

Detailed Description

template<>
template<typename U>
struct thrust::device_allocator< void >::rebind< U >

The rebind metafunction provides the type of a device_allocator instantiated with another type.

Template Parameters:
UThe other type to use for instantiation.

Member Typedef Documentation

template<typename U >
typedef device_allocator<U> thrust::device_allocator< void >::rebind< U >::other

The typedef other gives the type of the rebound device_allocator.
